summary: The Liberty City Rising Act aims to improve safety and security in public and federally assisted housing located in high-crime areas. The bill mandates the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to define high-crime areas based on violent crime data, establishes safety standards for public housing and project-based assisted housing, and requires public housing agencies to implement anonymous hotlines for reporting suspicious activity. The bill also prioritizes grant funding for safety and security measures in public housing projects located in these high-crime areas.
